scripts.setup:reset:hardcoded:staging: npm run env:setup:staging && pushd backend && npm run setup:reset:hardcoded && popd
scripts.setup:reset:hardcoded:prod: npm run env:setup:prod && pushd backend && npm run setup:reset:hardcoded && popd
scripts.setup:reset:hardcoded:local: npm run env:setup:local && pushd backend && npm run setup:reset:hardcoded && popd
scripts.env:setup:staging: pushd backend && npm run env:refresh:staging && popd && pushd mobile && npm run env:refresh:staging && popd && echo OK
scripts.env:setup:prod: pushd backend && npm run env:refresh:prod && popd && pushd mobile && npm run env:refresh:prod && popd && echo OK
scripts.env:setup:local: pushd backend && npm run env:refresh:local && popd && pushd mobile && npm run env:refresh:local && popd && echo OK
scripts.backend:deploy: git subtree push --prefix backend heroku master
